item.title: Warriors Rise To Glory
item.description: In this rogue-lite turn-based RPG, you create a bloodline of gladiators, fight online with or against your friends in the arena, decide the fate of your fallen rivals, and bring honor, wealth, and the spoils of war to improve your legacy. PLATFORM PC ROLE Unity Developer GENRE RPG, RougueLite, Turn Based, Strategy STATUS Published - You can play the game here PUBLISHER Gavra Games
